title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.12 - Additional information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.12 - Additional information

State Regulations

Nothing herein shall be deemed to prevent ORPTS from
requesting information necessary for the timely establishment of special
franchise assessments and full values from assessing units or owners in
addition to reports required by this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8197-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
